Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\handlers\health_test.go:21:11: string `application/json` has 3 occurrences, make it a constant (goconst)
internal\handlers\health.go:14:53: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\handlers\health.go:24:54: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\handlers\health.go:34:55: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
